thread.title_full: Kayla Itsines Bikini Body Guide Workout Discount Site reviewed by Cat

author: Cat
title: Cat
text: This discount is 100% real. I was super skeptical at first but took the plunge and purchased. You get 3 books (1.0 Guide, 2.0 Guide, + Diet Plan) and they are the full complete PDFs/Books. Not modified, short versions. I got all of them within 2 minutes of actually purchasing them and they are really informative, easy to understand, and I love that there are pictures showing each exercise so you really understand what you're being told to do.
